entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @realDonaldTrump Instead of these constant tweets about statues and memorials address your people about the real issues of the moment... increased Covid19 infections, wearing a mask in public places and why you STILL haven't said anything against the russian bounties.
